
```{r lectura-datos}
cantones <- 
  st_read(dsn = "C:/Users/Fiorela/Downloads/cantones_simplificados.geojson", quiet = TRUE) %>%
  st_transform(4326)
```

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Mapa de cantones 

```{r}

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles(group = "OpenStreetMap") %>%
  addPolygons(data = cantones,
              weight = 1.0,
              group = "Cantones") %>%
  addLayersControl(baseGroups = c("OpenStreetMap"),
                   overlayGroups = c("Cantones"))

```
